altername_name: Huan Le Tao Qi Shu: Smart Mouse
Huān Lè Táo Qì Shǔ: Smart Mouse
name: Smart Mouse
overview: Smart Mouse is a localization to English of a Taiwan Exclusive puzzle arcade game for the Sega Genesis. The game features Max the Mouse trying to get rid of annoying cats and slime creatures from the sewerage! Help him get clean up his alley by kicking blocks to get rid of the intrusive companions!
